select_samples: You have selected {mnam} Please select the amount of samples you would like the bot to generate! {warn}WARNING{warn} The higher the sample count, the more time it will take to generate the results!
select_size: You have selected {mnam} Sample Count {samc} Please select the size of the image you would like the AI to use!
select_inference: You have selected {mnam} Sample Count {samc} Image Size {imsi} Select the number of inference steps! The higher the better the image! {warn}WARNING{warn} The higher the inference steps, the more time it will take to generate the results!
reply_pos_prompt: You have selected {mnam} Sample Count {samc} Image Size {imsi} Inference Steps {infs} Please reply to this message with the prompt you would like the bot to use!
reply_neg_prompt: You have selected {mnam} Sample Count {samc} Image Size {imsi} Inference Steps {infs} User Prompt {uinp} Please reply to this message once more to set the negative prompt you would like the AI to use! Or reply with - to use the default negative prompt
final_message: You have selected {mnam} Sample Count {samc} Image Size {imsi} Inference Steps {infs} User Prompt {posp} User Negative Prompt {negp}
